confirmDialog.title: Are you sure?
confirmDialog.unsavedChangesText: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to close?

deviceLink.title: Link Device
deviceLink.description: Enter the code shown on your device to authorize it to access your account.
deviceLink.confirmDescription: A device is requesting access to your account. Please verify the details below.
deviceLink.successMessage: You can close this tab and return to the app.

connectorSetup.title: Nexterm Connector
connectorSetup.serverUrlDescription: Enter the URL of your Nexterm server to connect.
connectorSetup.connectionFailed: Failed to connect to server. Please check the URL.
connectorSetup.deviceLinkingNotSupported: This server does not support device linking. Please update your Nexterm server.
connectorSetup.authMethodDescription: Choose how you want to authenticate with the server.
connectorSetup.showCodeDesc: Display a code to enter manually on the web interface
connectorSetup.openBrowserDesc: Open your browser to authorize automatically
connectorSetup.enterCodeDescription: Enter this code on the Nexterm web interface to authorize this device.

noData.title: No data found
noData.subtitle: There are no items to display.

sidebar.logoutConfirmText: This will log you out of the {{username}} account. Are you sure?

webSocketConnection.title: WebSocket Connection Failed
webSocketConnection.message: Connections are unavailable. This may be due to WebSocket not being enabled in your reverse proxy or network restrictions.

page.title: Audit Logs
page.subtitle: Track and monitor all activities across your infrastructure

noLogs.title: No audit logs found
noLogs.subtitle: Try adjusting your filters or check back later.

page.title: Snippets
page.subtitle: Manage your command snippets for quick access in terminals

list.empty: You don't have any snippets yet. Create your first one!

page.title: Scripts
page.subtitle: Manage your automation scripts for server tasks

progressPanel.title: Script Execution
progressPanel.noStepsDescription: Steps will appear here as the script executes

list.empty: You don't have any scripts yet. Create your first one!

menu.noScripts: No scripts available. Create some in the Scripts section.

page.title: Server Monitoring
page.subtitle: Real-time server statistics and health monitoring

noServers.title: No Servers Found
noServers.subtitle:
No SSH servers available for monitoring.
Add some servers to start monitoring them.

status.offlineMessage: The server is currently not responding to monitoring requests.
status.errorMessage: Unable to establish connection to the server.
status.unknownMessage: Server status could not be determined.

charts.noData: No data available for the selected time range

processes.title: Running Processes
processes.noData: No process data available. Process data will appear after the next monitoring cycle.
processes.noResults: No processes match your search criteria.

account.title: Account
account.appearanceDescription: Choose your preferred theme. Auto follows your system settings and adjusts based on time of day.
account.twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account by enabling two-factor authentication.
account.changePasswordDescription: Choose a new and secure password for your account here.
account.languageDescription: Select your preferred language for the interface.
account.syncLoginRequired: Please log in to sync settings
account.appearanceSyncEnabled: Appearance settings will now sync to your account
account.appearanceSyncDisabled: Appearance settings will no longer sync
account.generalSyncEnabled: General settings will now sync to your account
account.generalSyncDisabled: General settings will no longer sync
account.sessionSyncDescription: Control how your server sessions are stored and synchronized across devices and browser tabs.
account.sessionSyncAcrossDevicesDesc: Sessions will be available across devices and synced
account.sessionSyncSameBrowserDesc: Sessions will synchronize for the current user session
account.sessionSyncSameTabDesc: Sessions will synchronize inside your browser tab

twoFactorDialog.title: Enable 2FA
twoFactorDialog.description: Scan the code with your authenticator app or enter {{secret}} manually.

passkeys.sectionDescription: Use passkeys for faster, more secure sign-in without passwords.
passkeys.addDialogDescription: Give your passkey a name to help you identify it later.
passkeys.enterName: Enter a name for this passkey:
passkeys.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this passkey?
passkeys.registerError: Failed to register passkey. Please try again.

passwordChange.title: Change password
passwordChange.description: A strong password contains special characters, numbers, and letters in both uppercase and lowercase.

organizations.title: Your Organizations
organizations.noOrganizations: You don't have any organizations yet.
organizations.noOrganizationsDescription: Create one to start collaborating with your team.
organizations.deleteConfirmation: This will permanently delete the organization and remove all members. This action cannot be undone.
organizations.leaveConfirmation: Are you sure you want to leave this organization?

users.title: {{count}} users
users.noUsersDescription: Create a new user to get started.

contextMenu.deleteConfirm: This will permanently delete the user and all associated data.
contextMenu.promoteConfirm: This will promote the user to an admin.
contextMenu.demoteConfirm: This will demote the user to a regular user.

keymaps.title: Keymaps
keymaps.description: Customize keyboard shortcuts to match your workflow.

broadcast.title: Broadcast Mode
broadcast.description: Toggle broadcast mode when using split view

terminal.title: Terminal
terminal.syncLoginRequired: Please log in to sync terminal settings

font.title: Font
font.description: Customize the font family and size for your terminal.
font.syncEnabled: Font settings will now sync to your account
font.syncDisabled: Font settings will no longer sync

cursor.title: Cursor
cursor.description: Customize the appearance and behavior of your terminal cursor.
cursor.syncEnabled: Cursor settings will now sync to your account
cursor.syncDisabled: Cursor settings will no longer sync

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Choose a color theme for your terminal.
theme.syncEnabled: Theme settings will now sync to your account
theme.syncDisabled: Theme settings will no longer sync

fileManager.title: File Manager
fileManager.description: Configure how files and folders are displayed and managed.
fileManager.syncLoginRequired: Please log in to sync file manager settings
fileManager.syncEnabled: File manager settings will now sync to your account
fileManager.syncDisabled: File manager settings will no longer sync

defaultView.title: Default View Mode
defaultView.description: Choose the default layout when opening the file manager.
defaultView.listDescription: Show files in a detailed list with size and date columns
defaultView.gridDescription: Show files as icons in a grid layout with thumbnails

thumbnails.title: Image Thumbnails
thumbnails.description: Show image thumbnails in grid view. This uses additional bandwidth to generate previews.
thumbnails.enabledDescription: Display image previews in grid view for quick visual identification
thumbnails.disabledDescription: Show only file icons to save bandwidth and improve performance

hiddenFiles.title: Hidden Files
hiddenFiles.description: Control visibility of hidden files and folders (names starting with a dot).
hiddenFiles.showDescription: Display all files including .dotfiles and system directories
hiddenFiles.hideDescription: Only show regular files and folders

deleteConfirmation.title: Delete Confirmation
deleteConfirmation.description: Require confirmation before deleting files and folders.
deleteConfirmation.enabledDescription: Show a confirmation dialog before deleting items
deleteConfirmation.disabledDescription: Delete files without asking for confirmation

dragDropAction.title: Drag & Drop Action
dragDropAction.description: Default action when dragging files to a new location.

authentication.title: {{count}} Authentication Providers
authentication.deleteConfirm: This will permanently delete this authentication provider.

messages.saveFirst: Save the provider first to test the connection

ai.title: AI Assistant Configuration
ai.description: Configure AI-powered command generation for terminal sessions and snippet creation.

enable.title: Enable AI Assistant
enable.description: Allow users to generate commands using AI

model.title: Model
model.description: Select the AI model to use for command generation

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: Your OpenAI API key for authentication
apiKey.setPlaceholder: API key is set (leave blank to keep current)

ollamaUrl.title: Ollama URL
ollamaUrl.description: The URL where your Ollama instance is running

statusChecker.title: Status Checker
statusChecker.description: Configure how Nexterm checks the online/offline status of your servers.

enable.title: Enable Status Checker
enable.description: Automatically check if servers are online or offline. When disabled, all servers will be marked as online.

interval.title: Check Interval
interval.description: How often to check server status (10-300 seconds)

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: Configure monitoring data collection for CPU, memory, disk, and network metrics.

enable.title: Enable Monitoring
enable.description: Collect detailed performance metrics from servers with monitoring enabled.

interval.title: Collection Interval
interval.description: How often to collect monitoring data (30-600 seconds)

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.description: How long to keep monitoring data (1-24 hours)

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.description: Fine-tune monitoring performance and resource usage.

timeout.title: Connection Timeout
timeout.description: Maximum time to wait for a server response (5-120 seconds)

batchSize.title: Batch Size
batchSize.description: Number of servers to check simultaneously (1-50)

identities.title: SSH Keys & Credentials
identities.description: Manage your SSH keys and login credentials for server connections
identities.noIdentitiesDescription: Create your first identity to get started with server connections
identities.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone and will remove this identity from all servers that use it.

fields.name: Identity Name
fields.passwordPlaceholderEdit: Leave blank to keep current password
fields.passphrasePlaceholderEdit: Leave blank to keep current passphrase

sources.title: Script & Snippet Sources
sources.description: Configure external sources to automatically sync scripts and snippets.
sources.noSourcesDescription: Add external sources to automatically sync scripts and snippets.
sources.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the source "{{name}}"? All synced scripts and snippets from this source will also be deleted.

dialog.name: Name
dialog.enabledDescription: When disabled, this source will not be synced

storage.title: Storage
storage.description: View disk usage for your Nexterm data.

backupsSection.title: Backups
backupsSection.description: Configure backup providers and schedule automatic backups.

backup.noProvidersDescription: Add a backup provider to start creating backups.
backup.restoreConfirm: Are you sure you want to restore "{{name}}"? This will overwrite your current data and restart the server.
backup.deleteProviderConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This will not delete existing backups.

sessionEnded.title: Session Ended
sessionEnded.description: The shared session has been closed

jumpHosts.title: Jump Hosts
jumpHosts.description: Connect through intermediate servers to reach this target server
jumpHosts.noServersAvailable: No SSH servers available for jump hosts. Create SSH servers first.

monitoring.title: Enable Performance Monitoring
monitoring.description: Collect CPU, memory, disk, and network metrics for this server

wakeOnLan.title: Enable Wake-On-LAN
wakeOnLan.description: Allow waking this server remotely using its MAC address

keyboardLayout.title: Keyboard Layout
keyboardLayout.description: Select the keyboard layout to use for this connection.

display.title: Display Settings
display.description: Configure color depth and resize behavior for the remote display

performance.title: Performance Settings
performance.description: Toggle visual effects that may impact performance over slower connections
performance.enableWallpaperDesc: Show the desktop wallpaper on the remote system
performance.enableThemingDesc: Use themed windows and controls on the remote system
performance.enableFontSmoothingDesc: Render text with smooth edges for better readability
performance.enableFullWindowDragDesc: Display window contents while dragging windows
performance.enableDesktopCompositionDesc: Enable transparent windows and visual effects
performance.enableMenuAnimationsDesc: Enable menu open and close animations

audio.enableAudioDesc: Stream audio from the remote system to your browser

terminal.title: Terminal Compatibility
terminal.description: Adjust key behavior for different terminal types

settings.noSettings: No additional settings available for this entry type.

identities.orgDescription: Shared with all organization members. Everyone can use these identities.
identities.personalDescription: Only visible to you. Other organization members cannot see these.
identities.noOrgIdentities: No organization identities. Create one to share with all members.
identities.noPersonalIdentities: No personal identities. Create one for your private use.
